org.xflatdb.xflat.db

Class XFlatDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xflatdb.xflat.db.XFlatDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Database

    public class XFlatDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
implements Database
    The base class for classes that manage tables and conversion services.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • XFlatDatabase

        public XFlatDatabase(java.io.File directory)
        Creates a new database in the given directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - The flat-file directory in which tables should be stored.

      • XFlatDatabase

        public XFlatDatabase(java.io.File directory,
             java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService executorService)
        Creates a new database in the given directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - The flat-file directory in which tables should be stored.
        executorService - The executor service to use for all database-related tasks. If null, the database will create one in Initialize.

      • configureTable

        public void configureTable(java.lang.String tableName,
                  TableConfig config)
        Configures a table with the given table configuration.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The name of the table to configure.
        config - The configuration to apply.

      • Initialize

        public void Initialize()
        Initializes the database. Once initialized the database can provide tables and operate on underlying data.

        The database will register a shutdown hook with the runtime to clean up any resources and abandon all running tasks. This shutdown hook will be removed when shutdown() is called.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts down the database. This method blocks until the database is completely shut down, as long as it takes.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown(int timeout)
              throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Shuts down the database. This method blocks only until the timeout expires - if the database is not completely shutdown in that time, a TimeoutException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        timeout - The number of milliseconds to wait before timing out
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - if the database did not fully shut down before the timeout expired.

      • extendConversionService

        public void extendConversionService(PojoConverter extender)
        Extends the database's conversion service with the given PojoConverter. It does this by invoking PojoConverter.extend(org.xflatdb.xflat.convert.ConversionService) using the database's current conversion service, in a synchronized context.
        Parameters:
        extender - The extender that should extend the database's conversion service.

      • getTable

        public <T> Table<T> getTable(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Description copied from interface: Database
        Gets a table that converts the data to the persistent class.

        The table will be named with the class' simple name.

        Specified by:
        getTable in interface Database
        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic class of the persistentType
        Parameters:
        type - The persistent class, which the Database can convert to and from Element.
        Returns:
        A table for manipulating rows of the persistent class.

      • getTable

        public <T> Table<T> getTable(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                    java.lang.String name)
        Description copied from interface: Database
        Gets the named table that converts the data to the given persistentClass.

        Multiple different classes of data can be stored in the same named Table provided certain conditions are met.

        Specified by:
        getTable in interface Database
        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic class of the persistentType
        Parameters:
        type - The persistent class, which the Database can convert to and from Element.
        name - The name of the table.
        Returns:
        A table for manipulating rows of the persistent class.

      • getEngine

        public EngineBase getEngine(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the internal EngineBase that has been spun up to manage the given table. This internal engine is the low-level manager of the database on disk.

        Please use getTable(java.lang.Class) instead. It is preferable to interact with the data via the Table interface.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the table for which an engine is desired.
        Returns:
        A running EngineBase which manages the table.

        public PojoConverter getPojoConverter()
